MINE_TRANSFER_MSG_001: Use this Transportation Device to reach the Fallen City?Ă
MINE_TRANSFER_MSG_002: Use this Transportation Device to reach the Grim Tundra?Ă
DONT_USE_TRANSFER_010: The Transporation Device is offline. You won't be able to use it at this time.
DEMO_202_AFT_NPC_A:
́Kee-kee! I am Lord Bundold's main henchman, Bonebat. What do you want, kee!?
ā
... Kee!? Hand over the Garden Key!? That's mine to keep! Kee-hee-hee!
ā
Now, just turn around and we'll pretend this never happened!Ă
DEMO_202_AFT_NPC_A_YES: ́That's a smart move... now get lost, kee!
DEMO_202_AFT_NPC_A_NO: ́Kee-kee! You aren't that bright, kee! You'll have plenty of time to think this decision over in hell, kee!
DEMO_202_AFT_NPC_B_YES:
̂Bah! As long as I've got my charm, no one will resist us!
Time to die, lover boy!
NPC_UNDERLING_A_002:
́Gahhh... ! I can't believe I lost the Garden Key to this bunch...
ā
P-P-Please... forgive me... Lord Bundold!
DEMO_202_AFT_NPC_B:
̂Ooooo-oh my, aren't you a handsome devil. Do you have any business with Bundold's sweetest minion, Charmbat?
ā
You want the Garden Key? But... what could you want with that!?
ā
Wait a minute, are you with the Resistance? Are you planning to overthrow Lord Bundold?Ă
DEMO_202_AFT_NPC_B_NO:
̂Just as smart as you are handsome! Perhaps you'd go 
on a date with me once I'm off duty.
NPC_UNDERLING_B_002:
̂T-T-To think... I would lose the key to this lot... I let my guard down because of your handsome face...
ā
But unless you gather all three keys... this means nothing! Forgive me... Lord Bundold...
DEMO_202_AFT_NPC_C:
́The name's Corpsebat! Lord Bundold's most loyal servant!
ā
... You're after the Garden Key!? No-no-no... you will not get your grubby mits on that.
ā
I'm under orders to secure this key while our investigation on the Resistance continues! Please, leave me be!Ă
DEMO_202_AFT_NPC_C_YES: ́Yes, yes... excellent! It is best not to defy the Great Bundold or his loyal subjects!
DEMO_202_AFT_NPC_C_NO: ́How unfortunate for you. Allow me to drive you headfirst into the ground below!
DOOR_OPEN_MSG_001:
Used the Garden Key to open the gate!
ā
The Garden Key broke off inside the gate...
NPC_UNDERLING_C_002:
́Urg-hhh... forgive me, Lord Bundold... I, Charmbat, have... f-failed you!
ā
I leave these... people to you... my other winged friends... ga-hhh!
GRAVE_NPC_A_REC: ̄One of the three minions protecting Bundold's Gates. This one appears to be the leader of the three.
MINE_KAME_MSG:
It's a stone statue, sculpted in the image of a Nochoro.
It gives off a magical kind of feeling.
DOOR_NOTOPEN_MSG_002: You'll need a key to open this door.
DOOR_NOTOPEN_MSG_003: You'll need a key to open this door again.
NPC_GOST_C_050:
̂Speaking for all ghosts, we prefer the cloudy weather.
ā
The burning glar of the sun has the same affect on us as
Sizz would no you humans.
DOOR_OPEN_MSG_002:
Used the Garden Key to open the gate!
ā
The Garden Key broke... discarded the Garden Key.
DOOR_OPEN_MSG_003:
Used the Garden Key to open the final gate!
ā
The Garden Key broke... discarded the Garden Key.
LOCK_DOOR_MSG_00: There is a door here protected by some kind of security device.
LOCK_DOOR_MSG_02: You'll need to find a Security Code first before you can open this door...
LOCK_DOOR_MSG_04: ́The Security Code was accepted. Now unlocking the door.
GRAVE_NPC_B_REC: ̄One of the three minions protecting Bundold's Gates. This one has a cute look about her.
GRAVE_NPC_C_REC: ̄One of three minions protecting Bundold's Gates. This guy looks bad, but is actually the most reasonable of the bunch.
GRAVE_NPC_GOST_REC: ̄The ghost of a monster, stuck between the worlds of the living and the dead.
NPC_GOST_A_010:
̂When you first transport to the Grim Tundra, it's a good idea to visit Polar Park first.
ā
Polar Park is a huge town, and home to one of Lucia's closest allies.
NPC_GOST_A_020: ̂Hey, if it's not ȁ. What business do you have here at the Spirit Road?
NPC_GOST_A_030:
̂This terrible sky... could it be caused by a Break Monster?
ā
Maybe you should use a Transporter to get up to that machine in the sky and bring it down here.
NPC_GOST_A_040:
̂I know something that may help you. A place where I often saw huge monsters has been fading away.
ā
I think something is wrong at the Violent Spirit Road.
ā
And I'm sure only you can do something about it.
NPC_GOST_A_050:
̂How odd, meeting you in a place like this.
ā
What's that? You came to use the Transporter Device?
NPC_GOST_A_060: ̂Everything is fine. You can still use theMoving Apparatus. Good luck, ȁ.
NPC_GOST_A_070: ̂You're on fire, ȁ! I feel safe because we have you to rely on.
NPC_GOST_B_010:
̂Monsters holding a Garden Key are carefully selected minions of Bundold.
ā
They aren't as strong as Bundold, but still tough, if that gives you any peace of mind.
NPC_GOST_B_020: ̂It looks like all of Bundold's minions have been defeated.
NPC_GOST_B_030:
̂I've never seen such an ominous sky... and that mass in the sky...
ā
There's no time to mess around with such sinister activity afoot... and yet we're so helpless down here on the ground.
NPC_GOST_B_040:
̂It would seem we've been saved. But, the problem still lingers...
ā
The true ringleader is still out there somewhere. Surely, the solution would be to vanquish it.
NPC_GOST_B_050:
̂It's become considerably more quiet and peaceful around here, but the monsters have not gone away.
ā
The biggest difference is that Bundold no longer dictates all of us. And it's all thanks to you.
NPC_GOST_B_060: ̂It's raining monsters! What is going on!
REC_POINT_GRAVE_02: ̄An elaborate grave marker, built from stone. The shrine's entrance is cemented shut to prevent graverobbers from entering.
NPC_GOST_B_070: ̂These monsters aren't vicious anymore. Huh? You're behind this?
NPC_GOST_C_010: ̂Security in the Undead Garden is very tight! Watch out for Bundold's henchmen!
NPC_GOST_C_020: ̂You've left the gate to the Undead Garden open. I guess I'll close it one more time for you.
NPC_GOST_C_030:
̂My anxiety grows worse and worse every time I look at the sky.
ā
The darkness is slowly shrouding the world and I can only wonder why...
NPC_GOST_C_040:
̂Oh... the sky is back to normal! What is this feeling... it's so nostalgic.
ā
Sometimes losing the simplest things we take for granted can cause so much suffering.
NPC_GOST_C_060:
̂It's so scary. Mosters from the spirit world came!
ā
Unlike the monsters here, they're far more vicious.
NPC_GOST_C_070: ̂Monsters from the Spirit World suddenly very gentle with us.... Do they want to be friends?
NPC_GOST_H_010:
̂Bundold constructed three gates to protect him inside 
of the Undead Garden. 
ā
Each one is locked tightly by a unique key.
ā
His three minions, residing within the Spirit Road's Graveyard area, each hold one of these keys.
REC_POINT_DOOR_02: ̄A door protected by a security device. It won't open without the Security Code.
NPC_GOST_H_020: ̂Amazing... I wasn't sure if you would be able to collect all three Garden Keys.
REC_POINT_DRONE_HOLE_02: ̄It looks hollow inside. You can check it out using the drone.
NPC_GOST_H_030:
̂This is unbelievable... you defeated Bundold.
ā
I must say... I never thought we'd be free of his rule ever again.
NPC_GOST_H_040:
̂Surely there must be someone even worse out there.
ā
And... to think, they scoffed at the job of overseeing our Spirit Road.
NPC_GOST_H_050: ̂Whew... it's finally over. It's a terrible calamity... really.
REC_POINT_PARK_02: ̄The southern entrance to the dazzling Neon Park area.
NPC_GOST_H_060:
̂It looks like you'll be leaving us... is someone else in need of your help?
ā
Well, thank you... I feel no matter how big the problem is, you'll be able to solve it.
NPC_GOST_H_080: ̂I've never seen monsters from the Spirit World. I wonder what they're doing here.
NPC_GOST_H_090: ̂You came all the way out here for a patrol? The mosters from the spirit world aren't vicios anymore.
NPC_GOST_H_070:
̂Are you looking for something? By the way, the Nochora you are with....
ā
I feel like I've him hee before. It's a ilttle rough to get there but I think it was in the west.
NPC_GOST_G_010:
̂This is the first time I've ever seen the sky turn this color, and, as a ghost, I've been around a while.
ā
It's the same color as that poison cloud in the sky... this cannot be a good omen.
NPC_GOST_G_040: ̂I heard that you got rid of that Black Pollen. Amazing... What will do you now?
REC_RA_DOOR_030: They don't appear to have any significance at this time...
GIM_BOX_REC_01:
̄I'm detecting a form of life, from inside of the box.
Would you like to see what's inside?Ă
GIM_BOX_REC_02: The monster in the container started an attack!
GIM_BOX_REC_03: ̄There is an item in this container. Would you like he open it?Ă
CORD_REC_02:
It contained special data! You've received all of the
data on the Spirit Road!
REC_POINT_TRANSFER_02: ̄Equipment used to transfer Masters between the different Realms. This one is connected to the Fallen City.
REC_POINT_TRANSFER_03: ̄Equipment used to transfer Masters between the different Realms. This one is connected to the Grim Tundra.
REC_POINT_PARK_04: ̄The North Entrance to the dazzling Neon Park area.
REC_RA_DOOR_011:
̄A door leading to another world. It was discovered
by in the Mirror of Ra's reflection, which shows the truth.
REC_POINT_DOKU_NUMA_02: ̄Poison seeps out from the ground. Touching the toxic water will cause damage to your entire team.
REC_POINT_DOKU_IKE_02: ̄Poison seeps out from the ground. Touching the toxic water will cause damage to your entire team.
REC_POINT_TUNNEL_02: ̄A large tunnel has eroded here from years of exposure to poisonous waters.
REC_POINT_UNDEAD_GARDEN_02:
̄An old cathedral built carefully by hand. The interior is old and starting to crumble.
ā
The Resistance converted it into a secret base. Lucia renovated the interior by hand.
REC_RA_MONS_MES:
̄An Insurgent Demon transformed by Mother's
rampage. It has an frightening amount of power.
REC_POINT_CORE_02:
̄A celestial body that exists in the center of the world. 
There is no more data on it.
REC_POINT_BARIKEDO_A_02: ̄One of three gates Bundold made to secure his rule over this area. A minion holds the key to each one.
REC_POINT_BARIKEDO_B_02: ̄One of three gates Bundold made to secure his rule over this area. A minion holds the key to each one.
REC_POINT_BARIKEDO_C_02:
̄The ever-cautious Bundold created a series of gates to protect himself behind. They cannot be opened without the three Garden Keys held by his minions.ā
You'll need to find his three wary minions and get their keys.
REC_POINT_RULER_02:
̄Attuning to this Zoom Stone will add it to your destination list.
These stones appear in various places around the world.
REC_POINT_HASHIRA_02: ̄A device that will activate Masters Road for those who wish to improve their riding technique.
REC_POINT_KAME_BEFORE: ̄ The Ra Function is reacting to the target very strongly! Activate Ra Function to unmask target.
NPC_SASURAI_MSG:
́My life's mission... god... beast...?
ā
I wonder what it is. I feel like I've forgotten about something very important.
NPC_SASURAI_REC: ̄ He is fretfully wandering the break world trying to rememer something.
